1.title: Jackson's Deal

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Jackson Carter returns. In Egypt in 2013, Jackson and his friends attempt a deal for an ancient scarab box, but things do not go quite as planned.

2.title: Complications & Opportunities

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: The villainous Henry Tanner returns, pressing Amid for the location of the scarab box. Meanwhile, strange seismological activity has excited Dr. Ralph Mallord.

3.title: Akhenaten's Secret

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Dr. Melinda McGillicutty reveals the Scarab box as the first clue to finding the Lost Tomb of Pharaoh Akhenaten.

4.title: Clues & Cookery

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Amid attempts to retrieve the scarab box from Jackson, while he and his friends attempt to decipher the second clue to finding Pharaoh Akhenaten's lost tomb.

5.title: Class Interrupted

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Demanding information on the scarab box she translated for Jackson Carter, Will Tanner and the villainous Sholto interrupt Melinda McGillicutty's lecture and hold the students hostage.

6.title: Insurrection

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Henry Tanner searches for Jackson while Melinda and the students are held hostage by his brother.

7.title: Tanner vs. Carter

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: The ultimate showdown between hero and villain, as Jackson searches for the Obelisk, but finds Henry Tanner has beaten him to it.

8.title: The Obelisk

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Jackson and friends decipher the third and final clue to finding the Lost Tomb of Pharaoh Akhenaten.

9.title: The Light Beneath the Sand

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Jackson and friends find Pharaoh Akhenaten's Lost Tomb, which is rumored to hide the Staff of Moses.

10.title: Turning Point

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: The Epic conclusion in the search for the Staff of Moses. Will Jackson escape the Lost Tomb, and what change will the adventure have on Melinda?

1.title: The Cave

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Spanish witch Elena searches for a cave, while museum curator, Rafael Avila discovers he has been robbed.

2.title: New Student

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Jackson and Connor meet with a new archeology student, and Jackson learns he is needed in Spain.

3.title: The Missing Key

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: At the Anthropology Museum in Madrid, Spain, Jackson learns of a stolen key that unlocks a Grimoire made by ancient Mayan witches.

4.title: Senor Ramos

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Jackson and Detective John visit Senor Ramos, in hopes of learning more of the mysterious archeologist who may have something to do with the stolen key of the Witch's Grimoire.

5.title: Villains

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Spanish witch Elena meets up with the assassin Thorton, and the identity of the mysterious archeologist is revealed. The villains must all work together in order to find the Grimoire.

6.title: Marketplace

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Jackson Carter receives a cryptic message from the witch Elena.

7.title: The Grimoire

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Heroes and Villains meet in the forests of Mexico, while Elena the witch finds the Grimoire of the ancient Mayan witches.

8.title: Naguals

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Spanish Witch Elena raises the spirits of the ancient naguals, Mayan shape-shifting goatmen. Jackson and crew have joined with the villainous Henry Tanner and his henchman, but who will survive and who will reach the cave first?

9.title: The Evil Burial

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: The Witch Elena casts a spell in the sacred cave to destroy hero and villain alike. Can they stop her in time, or will this be the end of Jackson Carter?.

10.title: Too Dangerous

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: In the Season One finale, the heroes deal with the aftermath of Elena's evil spell and what to do with the Witch's Grimoire.

1.title: Supernatural Causes

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: After the events of The Curse of the Demon Seal in 2014, adventure villain Henry Tanner returns to India to steal the body of Sholto. In the present, Jackson Carter hunts down a thief in Russia for a mysterious golden goblet.

2.title: Professors in Peril

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Professors are attacked in Jackson's office by a man looking for information on a mysterious African bracelet.

3.title: The Legend of Chief Kitamba

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Jackson Carter visits the ex of Dave Roberts, who may unwittingly have a clue to finding a a magic urn who's contents can bring people back from the dead.

4.title: Alley Escape

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Jackson and Jessica attempt an escape after discovering the location of the magic urn.

5.title: The Magic Urn

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: In Africa, Jackson finds the Magic Urn, but the villainous Henry Tanner and the others are not far behind.

6.title: Spirits of the Past

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Jackson struggles with actions from his past and the people forever affected by them.

7.title: Prayer to the King of the Dead

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: The villains, led by Henry Tanner, gather to raise Myra's brother, Sholto, from the dead using the power of the African urn and an ancient magic ritual.

8.title: Anna's Advice

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Jackson's rescuer is revealed as Anna Young returns, and she must help him recover from his ghostly confrontations.

9.title: Rooftop Revenge

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Sholto seeks his revenge on Anna for killing him two years ago while Myra confronts Jackson Carter.

10.title: Clinging to the Edge

episode of.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: With the magic urn destroyed, Jackson Carter must deal with the resurrected villain, Sholto.

imdb.title: The Adventures of Jackson Carter
akas: The Adventures of Jackson Carter (United States)
plot: The historical and supernatural adventures of archeologist Jackson Carter as he searches for ancient items and legendary relics.
